sub_title: Looking for a new challenge in the field of Natural Resource Management / Forestry. Location: Netherlands or abroad
summary:
Experienced in the field of Scientific Forest Research, Forest Management, Environmental Consultancy, Animal (Cattle) Disease Prevention & control.

Interested in (International) Forest Ecology and Management, Nature Conservation, REDD+, Ecological Services, The Economics of Ecosystems and Biodiversity (TEEB), Natural Resource Management.
